all_versions.name: Aurion Pattern

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Aurion

test_cases.input: Please enable JavaScript in your browser or refer to you internal IT support for assistance.

all_versions.pattern: Please\ enable\ JavaScript\ in\ your\ browser\ or\ refer\ to\ you\ internal\ IT\ support\ for\ assistance\.

all_versions.name: Aurion Pattern

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Aurion

test_cases.input: <!-- Aurion Teal will be used as the login-time default. Shell layouts will replace these after login. -->

all_versions.pattern: <!\-\-\ Aurion\ Teal\ will\ be\ used\ as\ the\ login\-time\ default\.\ Shell\ layouts\ will\ replace\ these\ after\ login\.\ \-\->

all_versions.name: Aurion Pattern

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Aurion

test_cases.input: <!-- teal.css has stuff needed for div#loading-noscript -->

all_versions.pattern: <!\-\-\ teal\.css\ has\ stuff\ needed\ for\ div\#loading\-noscript\ \-\->

all_versions.name: Aurion Pattern

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Aurion

test_cases.input: <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="chrome=1; IE=8; IE=7"> <!-- Stop Internet Explorer from using "Compatability Mode" -->

all_versions.pattern: <meta\ http\-equiv="X\-UA\-Compatible"\ content="chrome=1;\ IE=8;\ IE=7">\ <!\-\-\ Stop\ Internet\ Explorer\ from\ using\ "Compatability\ Mode"\ \-\->
